title: Electrochemical performance of a Li+-enriched metallohydrogel as an electrolyte and electrode material for supercapacitors
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00096J, Communication
Yeeshu Kumar, Moupia Mukherjee, Manish Kumar Dixit, Abul Kalam, Mrigendra Dubey
Li+-enriched metallohydrogel has been utilized as electrolyte and electrode material in supercapacitor applications.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
